TextBlock.Text: Soaring Boulder: So when I came back to shore after accidentally dropping my first recorder I found this big rock.

I noticed that I could move it with a good amount of ease thanks to this moon's low gravity, so I rolled it up the hill which sounds like the basis for a greek tragedy and chucked it into orbit because it'd be funny.
So as it turns out this was not a naturally forming moon of a moon. It's exactly what it says on the tin, it's just a boulder.
Though side note about that lake; I swear I saw movement from inside so yeah, I'm not going back there. Not even to recover my recorder.
Alright now to place it there so any visitors can learn whilst visiting. I'm at the same mountain so I just just need to wait for Soaring Boulder to come around again.
Oh! there it is! alright... *whoosh*...*smack followed by distant cheering*
